fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
Base: $2
1 House: $6
2 Houses: $12
3 Houses: $18
4 Houses: $25

Houses cost $35 each

fields.name: Stop-in Effects:
fields.value: The player who lands here rolls a d6. If they roll a 1, they are forced to surrender up to $100 + $100 x (# of houses on this property) rent they collect to the owner until their next turn.
